item.title: Testing a Web Component
item.description: The created web component (admittedly) is very simple and does not implement sophisticated behaviour (or any behaviour for that matter). It should be tested nonetheless. The part of the software stack actually running the tests is called a test runner. Another important part is the DSL to be used to write the tests. Basically install the following packages: karma (test runner) jasmine-core (test DSL) karma-jasmine karma-chrome-launcher karma-firefox-launcher Please note:
